name: Musketeer
description: Wielding musket and sword, you became a swashbuckling musketeer.

exploits.name: Cloak flourish
exploits.description: You can use a cape or cloak with a flourish to distract your foes; the garment counts as a small shield, but does not require a free hand to use it.

exploits.name: Musket charge
exploits.description: When charging with a melee weapon, you may begin your charge with a single musket shot, switch weapons, charge, and end it with a single melee strike.

exploits.name: Pistol-whip
exploits.description: You can use a firearm as a club by striking with the butt once per turn as a free action as long as you are currently wielding only that weapon.

exploits.name: Swashbuckler
exploits.description: Your swashbuckling swordplay gives you any two of the following universal exploits: Disarm, Sidestep, Taunt.

exploits.name: Whites of their eyes
exploits.description: You are accustomed to standing your ground as oncoming hordes charge, firing only when you see the whites of their eyes. When charged by an opponent, you may fire a free musket or pistol shot when they come within 10' of you.

exploits.name: Quick reload
exploits.description: You can fire your musket every action, rather than just once per turn.
